live_map_arcgis.printmap_colalaises: BOE Region, Total Depth, Formation, API, Latitude, Longitude, Operator, Spud Date, Well Name, Well Type
State, County, UWI, Operator, Projected Depth, Permit Date

layer.title: Permits (7 - 30 Days)
layer.server_definition_expression: PERMIT_DT < (current_date - 7) AND PERMIT_DT >= (current_date - 30) AND ACT_CODE IN ('A', 'B', 'E')

layer.title: Permits (30 - 180 Days)
layer.server_definition_expression: PERMIT_DT < (current_date - 30) AND PERMIT_DT >= (current_date - 180) AND ACT_CODE IN ('A', 'B', 'E')

layer.title: Permits - All Active
layer.server_definition_expression: (( PERMIT_DT >= (current_date - 730)) OR RELOC_DT >= (current_date - 730)) AND ACT_CODE IN ('A', 'B', 'E')

layer.title: Activity - Last 6 months
layer.server_definition_expression: (( PERMIT_DT >= (current_date - 180)) OR (RELOC_DT >= (current_date - 180)) OR (SPUD_DATE >= (current_date - 180)) OR (ABLOC_DATE >= (current_date - 180)) OR (COMP_DATE >= (current_date - 180)) ) AND ACT_CODE IN ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D')

live_map_arcgis.printmap_colalaises: Contractor, Latitude, Longitude, UWI, License Date, Operator, Production Type, Rig Name, Spud Date, Rig Status, Rig Sub-Status, Term Zone, Well Type

layer.title: Permits (7 - 30 Days)
layer.server_definition_expression: PERMIT_DT < (current_date - 7) AND PERMIT_DT >= (current_date - 30) AND ACT_CODE IN ('A', 'B', 'E')

layer.title: Permits (30 - 180 Days)
layer.server_definition_expression: PERMIT_DT < (current_date - 30) AND PERMIT_DT >= (current_date - 180) AND ACT_CODE IN ('A', 'B', 'E')

layer.title: Permits - All Active
layer.server_definition_expression: (( PERMIT_DT >= (current_date - 730)) OR RELOC_DT >= (current_date - 730)) AND ACT_CODE IN ('A', 'B', 'E')

layer.title: Activity - Last 6 months
layer.server_definition_expression: (( PERMIT_DT >= (current_date - 180)) OR (RELOC_DT >= (current_date - 180)) OR (SPUD_DATE >= (current_date - 180)) OR (ABLOC_DATE >= (current_date - 180)) OR (COMP_DATE >= (current_date - 180)) ) AND ACT_CODE IN ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D')
